review: Works beautifully & highly recommend its usage. Easy to install.
author: Annette Katz

review: Easy to connect and loads of applications on it. Much faster and responsive than my Wii U, PS3 and Chrome cast. I love how simply this device is and how much is included. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a way to enjoy streaming content in a simple yet effective manner.
author: Maikol

review: I recently purchased this device and up till now I've been satisfied. The only thing you will need to be aware of is the distance from your wireless router, specially if you have other wireless devices. The fire stick tv will have a lag, either than that it's a good product for the price. Installation and setup was easy. I recommend it, specially for first time streaming device users.
author: Atheizzy

review: WOW! I bought 2 of these for my daughters tv's in their bedrooms.  It has turned their inexpensive tv's into a "smart" tv like we have in the front room.  Had I known this we could have saved hundreds of dollars on our 60" "smart" television in our front room.  I would recommend this very highly!!

review: I bought this due to the price. It was delivered and i installed it. That was easy and the setup was easier than the other ones i have. The format is different so you will need to adjust to that if you are use to Roku or Itv. This unit does seem to preform better than the others i consider it to be the hardware make up. I do recommend the Fire Tv Stick to anyone who is considering Streaming Tv. Try it you will like it I'm sure.
